item.title: PrestaShop 8.2 Is Available
item.description: It’s been decided to release a new minor version of PrestaShop 8.2. This version includes a few improvements, as well as bug fixes. What’s new in PrestaShop 8.2? PrestaShop 8.2 is a minor version that includes a few improvements, as well as bug fixes, and it is relatively small compared to the previous minor versions. Here are some highlights. Improvements Correctly checking overrides during module installation PrestaShop used to check for overrides during module installation, but the process didnâ€™t fully block installation if a conflicting override was found.
